channel.title: Music – Tony Bennett
channel.description: Recent content in Tony Bennett on Music

item.title: Tony Bennett - Autumn Leaves
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 1055

The falling leaves
drift by the window
The autumn leaves
of red and gold
I see your lips
the summer kisses
The sun-burned hands
I- - used to hold
Since- you went away
the days grow long
And soon I’ll hear- -
old winter’s song
But- I miss you
most of all my darling
When autumn leaves
start to fall.

Since- you went away
the days grow long
And soon I’ll hear- -
old winter’s song
But- I miss you
most of all my darling
When autumn leaves
start to fall.

item.title: Tony Bennett - I Left My Heart In San Francisco
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: George Cory, Douglass Cross
KY: 2375 / KY: 7834

The loveliness
of Paris
Seems somehow
sadly gay
The glory that
was Rome
Is of another day
I’ve been
terribly alone
And forgotten
in Manhattan
I’m going home
To my city
by the bay
I left my heart
in San Francisco
High on a hill
it calls to me
To be where
little cablecars
climb halfway
to the star
The morning fog
may chill the air
I don’t care
My love waits there
in San Francisco
Above the blue
and windy sea
When I come home to you
San Francisco
Your golden sun
will shine
for me-

To be where
little cablecars
climb halfway
to the star
The morning fog
may chill the air
I don’t care
My love waits there
in San Francisco
Above the blue
and windy sea
When I come home to you
San Francisco
Your golden sun
will shine
for me-

item.title: Tony Bennett - Somewhere My Love
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 8669

Somewhere my love
there will be
Songs to sing
although the snow
Coverd the hope
of Spring
Somewhere
a hill blossoms
In green and gold
and there are dream
All that your heart
can hold
Someday we’ll
meet again my love
Someday whenever
the spring breaks
Through you’ll
come to me
Out of the long ago
warm as the wind
Soft as the kiss
of snow
Lara my own think
of me
Now and then
god speed my love
‘Til you are mine
again
Warm as the wind
soft as the kiss
Of snow
god speed my love
‘Til you are mine
again-
